name: Steamed Baby Carrots
keywords: carrot, mint, sugar, fall, kosher, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 bags of baby carrots, about 12 ounces each, scraped and washed

recipeInstructions.text: Steam the carrots for five minutes or until barely tender. Melt the margarine in a saucepan. Add the carrots, sprinkle with sugar, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Cook over high heat for five minutes, stirring all the time.
Sprinkle the mint over the carrots and serve.
